title: disable aurelion sol. his stars are invisible
body: just played a game against an aurelion sol where i literally could not see his stars at any range. it was his model and no stars, and yet i would take damage as normal. it was ridiculous. i literally could not see abilities that were hitting me, this needs to be addressed immediately.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Ralanr,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cxZ242JQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-18T19:46:07.849+0000)
>
> Again?!

I was most likely in his game that just ended; I could see the A-Sol's star perfectly fine, but that doesn't mean much i suppose?

"Again?!" As in this was a common LCS bug for a while. As I recall that bug had something to do with the number of spectators (used for the camera accounts) and the account ID numbers. It would render for the first X players/spectators, based on their account ID, but after that they wouldn't see the stars, even if they were a player.

it means that OP league data is faulty from too much pron. His own problem would most likely resolve with a reconnect.

A common similar example is when you cannot see HP bars. You just reconnect, and poof, they are back.
It's so annoying, feels bad, but riot is working on a resolution so it's all fine now. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
This happened like 2 weeks ago and I got wrecked by the stars because I couldnt see.

Same, except the stars would pop in and out of view randomly each time I killed him. He started off with no stars (invisible but still there) and then 2 stars came back the first time I killed him (1 star still invisible) and then disappeared the next time. Weird.
Can confirm, an ASol player on my team said that he could not see his own stars but I could see them just fine.
